name: EventHoursSpecification
description:
A structured value providing information about the opening hours of a place or a certain service inside a place.

The place is open if the opens property is specified, and closed otherwise.

If the value for the closes property is less than the value for the opens property then the hour range is assumed to span over the next day.
title: EventHoursSpecification

fields.name: validFrom
fields.title: validFrom
fields.description: The date when the item becomes valid.

fields.name: validThrough
fields.title: validThrough
fields.description: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.

fields.name: opens
fields.title: opens
fields.description: The opening hour of the place or service on the given day(s) of the week.

fields.name: duration
fields.title: duration
fields.description: The duration of the item (movie, audio recording, event, etc.) in ISO 8601 date format.

fields.name: splitDuration
fields.title: splitDuration
fields.description: The duration of a splitted event (e.g. an appointment) which is going to be created based on this specification.

fields.name: closes
fields.title: closes
fields.description: The closing hour of the place or service on the given day(s) of the week.

fields.name: dayOfWeek
fields.title: dayOfWeek
fields.description: The day of the week for which these opening hours are valid.
